purpose: Re-export module that provides a simplified API for toast notifications by re-exporting toast utilities from a centralized hooks location
key_points: Acts as a barrel export file for toast-related functionality
Re-exports useToast hook and toast function from @/hooks/use-toast
Provides a convenient import path for UI components needing toast functionality
Follows a common pattern in component libraries to organize exports

patterns: Barrel export pattern for organizing module exports
UI component library structure with separated hooks and components
Path alias usage (@/) for cleaner imports
Separation of concerns between UI components and hooks
issues: No TypeScript type exports - consumers won't have access to toast-related types if they exist
Circular dependency risk if @/hooks/use-toast imports from components
Could benefit from re-exporting any toast configuration types or interfaces
Consider adding JSDoc comments to document the re-exported items
